thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: California top court nixes Heller Ehrman 'unfinished business' claims

author: Jan Wolfe
title: California top court nixes Heller Ehrman 'unfinished business' claims
text:
Californiaâ€™s highest court on Monday said a dissolved law firm could not claim a share of the profits from unfinished work on matters its former lawyers took with them to new firms.
The California Supreme Court said the bankrupt estate of defunct law firm Heller Ehrman does not have a property interest in hourly fee matters in progress when it dissolved in 2008.
To read the full story on WestlawNext Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2FXd0kC
